attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in the current climate when all buisnes is finding things hard this addition to travel is adding to the burden when other rival (overseas) airline benfit from lower taxation.
Alevel pitch is all we ask for not a hand out or loan. Please reconsider this tax to releive some of the stress our industry is feeling today so we can pay our way in the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
